title: 2nd Floor 2x1.5- 55+ Senior Living At its Best 2x1.5 W/Patio
map_address: 3300 Winterhaven Street near Rainbow & At woods
posting_body: ['Winterhaven Senior Apartments', '55+ Active Senior Living Community in Las Vegas', 'For a beautiful home with convenient features, choose this two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment at Winterhaven!', 'In addition to a time-saving kitchen appliance package, the home offers expansive closets and a washer and dryer!', 'What more?', 'Residents of this community gain access to an array of excellent amenities, which include a clubhouse, resort-style pool, and business center!', 'Enquire now!', 'Floor Plan/Unit Amenities:', '* Central Heat and Air', '* Ceiling Fan in Dining/Living Room', '*', 'In-Home Stack-able Fullsize Washer/Dryer*', '* Walk-in Showers and or tubs', '* Granite Countertop in Kitchen and Bathrooms', '* Screened Front Door', '* Cabinets with Designer Hardware', '* Track Lighting in Kitchen and Dining Areas', '* Undermount Sink with Gooseneck Faucet', '* Wood-Style Flooring', '* All White Appliance Package', 'Property Amenities:', '* 15 Minutes from Las Vegas Strip and Casinos', '* Social Calendar', '* Complimentary Starbucks Coffee Bar', '* Business Center w/WiFi', '* New Resort-Style Pool & Cabana', '* Barbecue Grills', '* Handicap Accessible', '* Gated Community with Controlled Access', '* Covered Parking', '* Morning Blend and Social Hours', '* Instructor Led Elevate Fitness Classes', '* Tranquil Courtyard', '* Elevators', '* Minutes from Grocery Stores, Retail, and Restaurants', 'Parking:', 'Unassigned Covered parking', '$30 per month for assigned parking', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pet Friendly-breed restrictions', 'call for further inquiry', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday:-Friday 8:00am to 5:00pm', 'Saturday:\u20028:00am to 5:00pm', 'Sunday: Closed', 'Address: 3300 Winterhaven Street Las Vegas, NV 89108', 'Check out our website today at <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
